name: Project Submersion (PRE-ALPHA)
description:
A NEW PARKOUR ADVENTURE!

In Project Submersion (tentative title), you take the role of Ara Mizushima as she runs, jumps and climbs through the city of Kagami in a sprawling open world adventure. While the full adventure is not available in the open Pre-Alpha, you are free to fully test the robust parkour system that will carry Ara over, under and through the city's many obstacles.

In the Pre-Alpha Parkour Demo, you can:

  • Run, jump and climb on ledges!
  • Run across walls, or up them!
  • Slide under obstacles, or vault over them!
  • Swing under bars or around corners! Walk tight-ropes over large gaps!

Want to follow the indie development journey of Project Submersion? Devlogs are available on Youtube!

Join the conversation, make friends and submit bug reports through the Nonafox Guilded server! https://www.guilded.gg/i/kJOWOnop

NOTE: As Project Submersion is still in early development, these requirements are subject to change in later Alpha and Beta releases. They are not representative of the final product.

Nonafox is currently a one-man studio focused on creating games that intertwine interesting stories with fun gameplay! Project Submersion is being created and developed by Mukar.

DISCLAIMER: Project Submersion is in early development. Mechanical functionality, animations and such are works in progress and may not be representative of the final product.
